column2: Making a client-to-server request with user-controlled data in the URL allows a request forgery attack against the client.
column4: The [["URL"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-918/examples/ClientSideRequestForgeryBad.js:4:37:4:39"]] of this request depends on a [["user-provided value"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-918/examples/ClientSideRequestForgeryBad.js:2:39:2:53"]].
